EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Pivotal_Roadshow_Q416.Reminder - St. Louis 11-13-16
EmailTemplate.subject: See you tomorrow at the Pivotal Cloud-Native Roadshow!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://pivotal.io/event/pivotal-cloud-native-roadshow]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for signing up to attend the Cloud-Native Roadshow taking place tomorrow in St. Louis. We look forward to seeing you there!
Pivotal Cloud-Native Roadshow—St. Louis, MO Monday, November 14, 2016 8:30am – 9:30am Breakfast 9:30am – 10:30am The Cloud-Native Advantage 10:30am – 12:00pm The Promises of a Cloud-Native Platform 12:00pm – 1:00pm Lunch 1:00pm – 1:30pm The Value Moves Up the Stack 1:30pm – 3:15pm Architecting the Cloud-Native Application 3:15pm – 3:30pm Wrap Up Roadshow Agenda <[[https://pivotal.io/event/pivotal-cloud-native-roadshow/stlouis]]>
Location: Knight Center at Washington University <[[https://olin.wustl.edu/EN-US/partners-resources/Knight-Center/Pages/default.aspx]]> Washington University in St. Louis, Snow Way Dr., St. Louis, MO 63130 Map & Directions <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/Snow+Way+Dr,+St.+Louis,+MO+63130/@38.6503969,-90.3165052,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m5!3m4!1s0x87d8cab37c079cdd:0xbcabd9d5b6aaea52!8m2!3d38.6503969!4d-90.3143165]]>
Parking <[[http://connect.pivotal.io/rs/625-IUJ-009/images/Pivotal Software Meeting 11-14-16 %281%29.pdf]]> Guests who require parking, please print out the attached parking flyer and place it visibly on your dashboard. Additional details provided in the flyer.
Questions? Contact Jason Lee at jalee@pivotal.io <[[mailto:jalee@pivotal.io]]> or by phone at 415-300-7595 <[[tel:1-415-300-7595]]>.
We look forward to seeing you tomorrow!
The Pivotal Team
